name: FINE TIME FOR A BURGER
description:
THE YEAR IS 2020, COVID CASES ARE SURGING AROUND THE NATION, YET CURIOUSLY THE LOCKDOWN HAS BEEN LIFTED.  THE SUMMER RAGES ON  AND YOU FEEL THE HUNGER. YOU GOTTA HAVE A BURGER, SOMETHING YOU ARE SEEMINGLY INCAPABLE OF COOKING AND ENJOYING IN THE SAFETY OF YOUR OWN HOME. NORMALCY MUST RETURN. EVERYTHING IS FINE.

FINE TIME FOR A BURGER.

CONTROLS

ASDW: Move from table to table!

E: Chomp those burgers!

CREDITS

Words / Code / Pixels
Christopher Lu @christhemute

Music
Tallbeard Studios - Music Bundle

Font
Tiny Worlds - Pixel Font
